name: Shimmer N Spice Warm Cinnamon Shimmering Lip + Body Duo
about: What it is: A hydrating lip mask with a slight tingle and a body cream, both infused with a warm cinnamon scent and soft gold shimmer...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Highlighted Ingredients:- Coconut and Castor Oils: Bind and retain moisture for fuller-, healthier-looking lips..- Seven Luxe Oils (Kalahari Melon, Sorrel, Baobab, Sunflower, Rice Bran, Coconut, and Jojoba): Nourish skin and impart a glossy finish..- Pomegranate Sterols: Act as an all-natural, vegan alternative to lanolin, enhancing the lip moisture barrier and boosting hydration...Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Experience skin-loving hydration from head to toe with this cinnamon-aroma-laced lip mask and body cream. The lip mask reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles, visibly improving bounce and elasticity, and provides a slight tingle. The body cream provides long-lasting hydration with a glossy finish...This Set Contains:- 0.5 oz/ 15 mL Plush Puddin’ Intensive Recovery Lip Mask in Warm Cinnamon.- 2.5 oz/ 75 mL Butta Drop Whipped Oil Hydrating Body Cream Mini..Clinical Results: Plush Puddin’ Intensive Recovery Lip Mask:.In a 4-week consumer study on 54 people:.Immediately:.- Lips were hydrated..After 1 week:.- 96% agreed it hydrated lips overnight.- 96% agreed it conditioned lips overnight.- 94% agreed it left lips feeling soft in the morning..Butta Drop Whipped Oil Hydrating Body Cream:.In a 4-week clinical study on 55 people:.Immediately:.- Hydration doubled.- Visibly dry skin was improved..After 1 week:.- Elasticity was boosted 23%.- 100% agreed it conditioned and nourished skin.- 100% agreed it restored skin’s suppleness.- 98% agreed it gave skin a glossy sheen..Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Coconut and Castor Oils: Bind and retain moisture for fuller-, healthier-looking lips..-Seven Luxe Oils (Kalahari Melon, Sorrel, Baobab, Sunflower, Rice Bran, Coconut, and Jojoba): Nourish skin and impart a glossy finish..-Pomegranate Sterols: Act as an all-natural, vegan alternative to lanolin, enhancing the lip moisture barrier and boosting hydration...Plush Puddin’ Intensive Recovery Lip Mask in Warm Cinnamon:.Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Polyethylene, Silica, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum Flower Extract, Punica Granatum Sterols, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Aroma/Flavor, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491)...Butta Drop Whipped Oil Hydrating Body Cream:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Propanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Cetearyl Olivate, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Seed Oil, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Adansonia Digitata Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Plumeria Acutifolia Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Olivate, Polysorbate 60, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ethyl Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tromethamine, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Parfum/Fragrance, Cinnamal, Coumarin...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Plush Puddin’ Intensive Recovery Lip Mask:.-Apply to lips as needed in the AM and/or PM..-Twist base counter-clockwise to use. ..Butta Drop Whipped Oil Hydrating Body Cream:.-Apply all over your body, once a day. ..Recycling Instructions:.-The protective outer box is made of FSC material and is recyclable..-Plush Puddin’ is made from 100 percent PCR (post-consumer recycled) material. The entire pot is recyclable, depending on your region. Check your local guidelines..-When you’re done with Butta Drop, remove the lid and rinse the jar, then recycle both. The jar and cap are recyclable depending on your region. Check your local guidelines.

reviews.review_title: This Should Be Available Year Round
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all things cinnamon and this is fantastic! I wish Fenty offered this all year long. I have had some dryness issues after using the lip product if I don’t reapply every few hours, but I love it as a gloss on top of my lipstick- great smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When my package arrived, I was very excited as I saw so many good reviews on this product HOWEVER, what came as a  surprise to me was how awful the scent was in both products. Yes, there is shimmer and yes the formula is thick, but that does not make up the scent that it’s lacking.
